snippet: The action came after Chancellor Angela Merkel of Germany publicly criticized the Putin government for its intimidation of nongovernmental organizations.
abstract: Federal Justice Ministry charges Golos, Russia's only independent election monitoring organization, with violating controversial new law stating that nonprofit groups receiving financing from abroad must register as foreign agents.
lead_paragraph: The action came after Chancellor Angela Merkel of Germany publicly criticized the Putin government for its intimidation of nongovernmental organizations.

headline.seo: Russia Brings Charges Against Election Monitors
headline.main: Russia Takes Legal Action Against Election Monitors
headline.print_headline:
Russia: Election Monitoring Group
Will Face Charges Under New Law
